Detailed Description

"Software Lines of Code" processor.

CMSLOC currently only supports the PHP language.

Author:
Elliot Chance

Definition at line 13 of file CMSLOC.php.

Member Function Documentation

processBlockPHP ( $  iden,
$  b 
) [private]

Process a PHP block.

This is a nested method to recurse though blocks surrounded by {}.

Parameters:
$iden The identifier before the block starts.
$b The block contents
Returns:
TRUE.

Definition at line 162 of file CMSLOC.php.

processFilePHP ( $  path  )  [private]

Process a PHP file.

This method is private because you should always use processPath().

Parameters:
$path Relative or absolute path.
Returns:
TRUE on success, otherwise FALSE.
See also:
processPath()

Definition at line 67 of file CMSLOC.php.

processPath ( $  path  ) 

Process a directory or path.

If a directory is given, it will be recursed so all files and directories inside will be processed. This function will ignore hidden files (files starting with a dot.)

Parameters:
$path Relative or absolute directory or file.
Returns:
TRUE on success, otherwise FALSE.
